entry.title: ROSEBURG HAS FOURTH HOTTEST DAY OF 2025 ON MONDAY
entry.summary: July 8, 2025 6:00 a.m. Roseburg had the fourth hottest day of 2025 on Monday. Forecasters at the National Weather Service told News Radio 93-9 FM and 1240 KQEN that the mercury reached 96 degrees at the Roseburg Regional Airport. The hottest day of the year so far was June 9th when it got to...

entry.title: ZZ WARD AT HALF SHELL TUESDAY NIGHT

entry.title: TEMPLIN BEACH PARK CLOSED TUESDAY
entry.summary: July 8, 2025 3:30 a.m. Templin Beach Park is closed on Tuesday for additional flood cleanup. entry.title: UMPQUA VALLEY FARMERS MARKET WILL BE CLOSED THIS SATURDAY
entry.summary: July 8, 2025 3:20 a.m. The Umpqua Valley Farmers Market will be closed this Saturday to make way for downtown Roseburg activities taking place during Graffiti Weekend. entry.title: Crews Halt Spread of Round Top Fire Near Roseburg
entry.summary: Fire crews have successfully stopped the forward spread of the Round Top Fire near Roseburg, Oregon. The blaze, now fully contained by dozer lines, burned roughly 8 acres. Mop-up operations continue. No structures were threatened; cause under investigation.

entry.title: Oakland’s Fourth of July parade keeps its hometown spirit
entry.summary: OAKLAND — Oakland’s Fourth of July parade has been around since it featured horses and buggies. The hometown charm of the event, however, hasn’t been lost, though the parade has traded in carriages for sports cars.
